name: Sudoku Minimalist Infinite
description:
Play and relax in your breaks, to fortify your brain or just to pass the time.

✓ Minimalist ⋆ Procedural generation ⋆ Fully randomic ⋆ Inifinite levels

✓ No time ⋆ No scores ⋆ No helps ⋆ No distractions

✓ Choose gameplay colors freely

✓ Very easy ⋆ Easy ⋆ Medium ⋆ Hard ⋆ Expert

Procedural generation, with levels that are completely random and infinite, a game that will never let you down, whenever you need this Sudoku will be waiting for you.
